answers.answer: type 1 cant be cured and requires insulin for life, the body has no ability to make it any more, it is an autoimmune illness and noone knows what causes it. type2 diabetes can be prevented sometimes by attending to lifestyle, however that is not always the case, it can be diet controlled, oral tablets and sometimes insulin.
